How could an object that causes this exception get in the list of unprocessedRegistrarProviders

The most common case is when we do the initial discovery, the class FooRegistrar is not found, so we keep the provider around for later use. Once module foo is loaded, we can suddenly load FooRegistrar but it's not a valid registrar(see discoverLazy's javadoc for why it can be invalid). wdyt?
